text.inline_menu.buy_esim.text_menu:
*Buy eSIM*
You can buy an eSIM for a specific country or a certain region:
text.inline_menu.buy_esim.local_esim.tex:

text.inline_menu.buy_esim.local_esim.all:
*üåç Local eSIM packages:*
Please select the required amount of internet traffic:

*üåç Local eSIM*
You have selected an eSIM with a tariff of *{gb} GB for {days} days*. The tariff also includes:
   ‚Ä¢ Unlimited speed;
   ‚Ä¢ Secure connection;
   ‚Ä¢ Tethering mode.

‚ö†Ô∏è The eSIM provides internet traffic only, which works in the specified countries. No identity verification is required to issue the eSIM.

After payment, you will receive a QR code and additional information for eSIM installation. The validity period of the eSIM starts from the moment it is activated on your device.

---------

Before purchasing an eSIM, please ensure that your device is supported (iOS (https://t.me/fedafone_bot/ios_ru), Android (https://t.me/fedafone_bot/android_ru), Windows (https://t.me/fedafone_bot/windows_ru)).

By clicking the Buy eSIM button, you agree to the terms and conditions (https://t.me/fedafone_bot/terms_ru).
